headline.print_headline: California: Teenager Held To Ensure Testimony In Rape Case Is Released
headline.main: California: Teenager Held to Ensure Testimony in Rape Case Is Released

docs.snippet: A California judge ordered the release of a girl who had been placed in juvenile hall last month because prosecutors feared she would flee rather than testify against the man accused of raping her....
docs.abstract: Judge Lawrence Brown of Sacramento County Superior Court orders the release of a 17-year-old girl who had been placed in juvenile hall because prosecutors feared she would flee rather than testify at the trial of the man accused of raping her.
docs.lead_paragraph: A California judge ordered the release of a girl who had been placed in juvenile hall last month because prosecutors feared she would flee rather than testify against the man accused of raping her.
